Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, review the goals for the week, and gather materials related to level design.
Begin constructing 3D blockouts for the first promising level layout using the required tools.
Take a short break, browse level design websites for inspiration and techniques.
Continue working on the 3D blockouts, refining layouts based on feedback from previous projects.
Test the flow and pacing of the completed blockouts, walking through them to identify areas for improvement.
Document findings from the testing phase, noting specific areas that require adjustments.
Prepare to share blockouts with the development team by organizing files and feedback forms.
Check emails and respond to any messages before logging out.
